attributes.action: Scrap the proposed Knighthood for Sadiq Khan
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan has presided over the destruction of London during his tenure as Mayor of London. TfL has been financially harmed, LTN's have blighted our streets and crime has soared. We, the undersigned, do not believe this incompetence should be rewarded with a Knighthood.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed or blocked.
